statements: UPDATE influencer_partnerships SET collaboration_type = 'Sponsored' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE influencer_partnerships SET collaboration_start_date = '2021-08-15', collaboration_end_date = '2021-12-31' WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe' AND partner_name = 'XYZ Inc.';

UPDATE influencer_partnerships SET collaboration_type = 'Sponsored', collaboration_start_date = '2022-01-15', collaboration_end_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe' AND partner_name = 'ABC Company';
UPDATE influencer_partnerships SET collaboration_type = 'Affiliate', collaboration_start_date = '2022-02-20', collaboration_end_date = '2022-04-30' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE influencer_partner SET collaboration_description = 'Exciting new campaign' WHERE partner_id = 100
UPDATE collaboration_details SET audience_reach = 50000, collaboration_type = 'Sponsored Post', collaboration_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE collaboration_id = 200
UPDATE influencer_partner SET partnership_end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE partner_id = 1;
UPDATE collaboration_details SET collaboration_date = '2022-10-15', collaboration_type = 'Sponsorship', audience_reach = 50000 WHERE influencer_id = 2;
UPDATE Influencers SET follower_count = 500 WHERE influencer_name = 'John Smith';
UPDATE Partnerships SET partnership_type = 'Sponsored' WHERE partnership_id = 101;
UPDATE Influencers SET follower_count = 15000, category = 'Fashion' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Collaborations SET collaboration_details = 'Promote new product launch', collaboration_date = '2023-05-20' WHERE collaboration_id = 10;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 50000 WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Brands SET industry = 'Fashion', category = 'Apparel' WHERE brand_name = 'XYZ Clothing';
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 5000, partnership_status = TRUE WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Brands SET category = 'Fashion', industry = 'Retail' WHERE brand_id = 2;
UPDATE influencers SET follower_count = 2000, influencer_name = 'New Influencer Name' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE brands SET industry = 'New Industry', brand_name = 'Updated Brand Name' WHERE brand_id = 2;
UPDATE influencers SET follower_count = follower_count + 100 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE partnerships SET payment_amount = 5000.00, collaboration_description = 'New campaign launched' WHERE partnership_id = 3;
